name: circle-packing-timeline
description: d3.js plugin based on circle packing.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -g d3-request:d3,d3-selection:d3,d3-hierarchy:d3,d3-transition:d3,d3-interpolate:d3,d3-scale:d3,d3-path:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/circle-packing-timeline.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/circle-packing-timeline.js -c -m -o build/circle-packing-timeline.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/circle-packing-timeline.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/circle-packing-timeline.js build/circle-packing-timeline.min.js
